name: ngresizable
description: Simple, tree-shakable, AoT, Universal and WebWorkers friendly resizable component for Angular (2 and beyond).

scripts.build: rimraf dist && ts-node tools/inline-styles.ts && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig-esm.json && cp package.json dist && ts-node tools/cleanup.ts && ngc && mv lib/ngresizable.component.ts.bak lib/ngresizable.component.ts
